1.descricao: {3}, {T}: Tap target creature you control and target creature of an opponent's choice he or she controls. Each of those creatures deals damage equal to its power to the other.

regras.texto: The power of the creatures when the effect resolves is used to determine how much damage is done.
In multiplayer games, you can choose a different opposing player each time it the ability is activated.
Either or both creatures can be tapped prior to using the ability and it still works.

If either target is illegal at the time the ability resolves (whether because it has left the battlefield, because it has gained Shroud or Protection, or for any other reason), the ability taps the remaining target, but no damage is dealt. If both targets are illegal, the ability is countered.

2.descricao: Choose target creature. If it's attacking, it can't be blocked this turn. If it's blocking, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this combat by it and each creature it's blocking.

regras.texto: This spell can target any creature. The check for whether that creature is attacking or blocking made on resolution, and it will have the appropriate effect at that time.
If the creature is neither an attacking creature nor a blocking creature at the time the spell resolves, it will have no effect.
